item.title: Re: Kage-ship
item.content:encoded:
From what I can tell, you have to log in at least once every seven days and burn through all of your stamina (or most, I think Stamina <= 9 is what you want). Running missions is the preferred way, but as far as I know anything that burns through your stamina will do it.

If you are allowed to retake your village, scroll to the bottom of the village area and there should be a section there. Retaking your village bingos you (something about being tired out or some such).
